a: SHPE FAU is the Society of Hispanic Professional Engineers chapter at Florida Atlantic University. We host events, mentorship, projects, and career growth programs open to all majors.
Come to a GBM, fill out our interest form, and join our Discord + WhatsApp. Details are on the Home and Contact pages.
General Body Meetings are typically biweekly during the semester. Check the Events page (Google Calendar) and Discord announcements for dates.
Discord is posted in our Contact page and pinned messages. WhatsApp invite: https://chat.whatsapp.com/EXyD31DYkULLQeoyziiZgq?mode=ems_copy_c

q: How do points and the leaderboard work?
a: Earn points by attending events and participating in programs. The Leaderboard (coming soon) will show top contributors each semester.

q: How can companies sponsor SHPE FAU?
a: We’d love to connect! Reach out via the Contact page or email the board. We’ll share our sponsorship package and next steps.

q: How do I volunteer or join the leadership team?
a: We post openings in Discord/WhatsApp and at GBMs. Talk to any E-Board member or message us via Contact.

q: Where can I find resources to learn?
a: Check the Resources page for guides, workshops, and repos. We also run tech talks (APIs, Docker, security) — watch Discord for dates.
Yes — we host resume reviews and mock interviews during recruiting seasons. Join Discord to RSVP.
We organize build nights and CTF practice. Look out for announcements in Discord.
